name: vscode-hanzi-counter
description:
多功能文档字数统计，支持中文、日文、朝鲜/韩文，支持选区统计，点击即可高亮，也可用正则表达式自定义要统计的内容。

中国語/日本語/朝鮮/韓国語文字数計算ツール。중국어/일본어/한국어/조선어 세기 도구.

Customizable word counter with great support of Chinese characters (Hanzi), Japanese and Korean. Supports count in selection. Supports highlighting. Use custom regexes to match any character type you want.

vscode-hanzi-counter.statusBar.enabled.description:
Show counter on status bar. This configuration is overridable by language.
启用或禁用状态栏上显示的字数统计。(可给每个编程语言指定不同设置)

vscode-hanzi-counter.statusBar.alignment.description:
Place status bar item to left or right. Restart for changes to take effect.
将状态栏显示的字数统计放到左边还是右边。更改后需要重启。

vscode-hanzi-counter.statusBar.priority.description:
Status bar item priority. Restart for changes to take effect.
状态栏显示的优先级。更改后需要重启。

vscode-hanzi-counter.counter.regexes.description:
Regexes for matching each type of words or characters to count. Those items can be used in templates. With flags `gus`. Restart for changes to take effect. 
正则表达式表。更改后需要重启。

vscode-hanzi-counter.counter.templates.markdownDescription:
Each item is a JavaScript expression or code block that returns a markdown string. Items of `#vscode-hanzi-counter.counter.regexes#` can be used as variables. Restart for changes to take effect.

**This can execute arbitrary code and is NOT sandboxed. Please make sure any code used here is safe.**
